definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: House prices concern millions of households.
Wrought iron furniture and adorn article, had entered the country.
sentences.chinese: 鐵藝傢俱和飾品，已經走進了千家萬戶。

sentences.english: Make beautiful China furniture to thousands of users, won unanimous recognition.
sentences.chinese: 使美麗華傢俱進入千家萬戶，贏得用戶的一致認可。

sentences.english: Health provides the foundation for people's all-round development and has a direct bearing on the happiness of each family.
sentences.chinese: 健康是人全面發展的基礎，關係千家萬戶幸福。

sentences.english: Thousands of families talk about brand as spring wind comes at one night.
sentences.chinese: 忽如一夜春風來，千家萬戶談品牌。

sentences.english: House building is closely linked with numerable families living in cities.
sentences.chinese: 住宅建設與千家萬戶息息相關。
